title: Whats the Score?
description: You just started a scorekeeping internship at Codearchives’ basketball team. It’s a very prestigious job, and you don’t want to lose it, but you’re also extremely lazy. So you don’t count the score. Instead, you count the number of free throws ( 1 point ) and field goals ( 2 or 3 points). So your job is to find the total points when given the different types of goals scored.
inputSpec:
The input consists of 3 lines:
  - The first line consists of the number of 1-pointers
  - The second line consists of the number of 2-pointers
   - The third line consists of the number of 3-pointers
outputSpec: Output one number, the total score, given the distribution of all the throws.
notes:
3 one-pointer’s = 3 points
7 two-pointer’s = 7*2 points = 14 points
22 three-pointer’s = 22*3 points = 66
Total = 3 + 14 + 66 = 83 points
